DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate influence oral semaglutide pharmacokinetics ( exposure trial drug body ) ethinylestradiol levonorgestrel oral contraceptive combination drug healthy postmenopausal female .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Influence Oral Semaglutide Pharmacokinetics Ethinylestradiol Levonorgestrel Oral Contraceptive Combination Drug Healthy Postmenopausal Females
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal female , age least 45 year time signing informed consent . With least 12 consecutive month since last spontaneous menstrual bleeding ( uncertainty time last spontaneous bleeding , postmenopausal status confirm follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) 40 mIU/mL ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 20.0 29.9 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Considered generally healthy base medical history , physical examination , result vital sign , electrocardiogram clinical laboratory test perform screen visit , judge investigator Smoker ( define subject smoking least one cigarette equivalent per day ) . A subject smoking le one cigarette equivalent per day must able willing refrain smoking use nicotine substitute product trial Any blood draw excess 25 mL past 30 day , donation blood plasma excess 400 mL within 90 day precede screen Sitting blood pressure screening ( rest least 5 minute ) outside range 90139 mmHg systolic 5089 mmHg diastolic . If whitecoat hypertension suspect single repeat measurement allow , last measurement conclusive History major surgical procedure involve stomach potentially affect absorption trial product ( e.g . subtotal total gastrectomy , sleeve gastrectomy , gastric bypass surgery )
